mapper.sql: CONFIG_ID, CONFIG_KEY, CONFIG_VALUE, CONFIG_DESC, PROJECT_ID, MODULE_ID, DELETE_FLAG, OPT_USER, OPT_TIME, PRODUCTION_VALUE, PRODUCTION_USER, PRODUCTION_TIME, TEST_VALUE, TEST_USER, TEST_TIME, PRE_VALUE, PRE_USER, PRE_TIME
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM conf_project_config a WHERE a.CONFIG_ID=#{configId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.DELETE_FLAG =0

SELECT A.config_key from CONF_PROJECT_CONFIG A where A.delete_flag=0 AND A.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND A.MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT A.CONFIG_ID,A.CONFIG_KEY,A.CONFIG_VALUE,A.CONFIG_DESC,A.PROJECT_ID,A.MODULE_ID, A.DELETE_FLAG,A.OPT_USER,A.OPT_TIME,A.PRODUCTION_VALUE,A.PRODUCTION_USER,A.PRODUCTION_TIME, A.TEST_VALUE,A.TEST_USER,A.TEST_TIME,A.PRE_VALUE,A.PRE_USER,A.PRE_TIME,B.MODULE_ID AS MODULE_ID1, B.PROJ_ID,B.MODULE_NAME,C.ID,C.PROJ_CODE,C.PROJ_NAME,C.OWNER_ID,C.DEVELOPMENT_VERSION,C.PRODUCTION_VERSION, C.PRE_VERSION,C.TEST_VERSION,C.DELETE_FLAG AS PRJ_DELETE_FLAG,C.CREATE_TIME,C.UPDATE_TIME FROM CONF_PROJECT_CONFIG A, CONF_PROJECT_MODULE B, CONF_PROJECT C WHERE A.MODULE_ID = B.MODULE_ID AND A.PROJECT_ID=C.ID AND A.DELETE_FLAG =0 AND C.PROJ_CODE=#{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from conf_project_config where MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.update:
update conf_project_config
CONFIG_KEY = #{configKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFIG_VALUE = #{configValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFIG_DESC = #{configDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPT_USER = #{optUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPT_TIME = #{optTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRODUCTION_VALUE = #{productionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTION_USER = #{productionUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTION_TIME = #{productionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TEST_VALUE = #{testValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEST_USER = #{testUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEST_TIME = #{testTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRE_VALUE = #{preValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRE_USER = #{preUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRE_TIME = #{preTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where CONFIG_ID = #{configId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
